alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 715 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of Holly to 6 miles east of Two Buttes to 7 miles northwest of Vilas. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walsh, Vilas, Two Buttes and Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
